metadata.title: Docbase - Digitize Your Documents
metadata.description: The GDPR-compliant document management app. Scan, organize, and securely store your physical documents with on-device OCR and encrypted cloud storage.

hero.title: Your Documents.
hero.description: The GDPR-compliant document management app. Scan, organize, and securely store your physical documents with on-device OCR.

features.title: Everything You Need
features.description: Docbase provides all the features you need for modern document management.

scan.title: Scan Documents
scan.description: Photograph your documents with your camera. The app automatically detects edges and optimizes the image.

ocr.title: On-Device OCR
ocr.description: Text recognition directly on your device. Your documents never leave your phone - 100% GDPR compliant.

search.title: AI-Powered Search
search.description: Find any document in seconds. The intelligent search scans text, categories, and tags.

categories.title: Smart Categories
categories.description: Organize documents into categories like invoices, contracts, medical records, and more.

cloud.title: Secure Cloud
cloud.description: Your documents are stored encrypted in your personal Google Drive. Only you have access.

languages.title: 9 Languages
languages.description: Available in German, English, Turkish, French, Spanish, Polish, Russian, Italian, and Portuguese.

gdpr.title: Privacy is not a feature.
gdpr.onDeviceOcrDesc: Text recognition happens locally on your device
gdpr.yourDriveDesc: Files are stored in your personal storage
gdpr.driveScopeDesc: App can only access files it created
gdpr.madeInDesc: Developed with German privacy standards in mind

download.title: Ready for a paperless life?
download.description: Download Docbase for free now and digitize your first documents in minutes.

footer.description: The GDPR-compliant document management app. Digitize, organize, and secure your physical documents with on-device OCR and encrypted cloud storage.
